short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: X Pro adds new features to your X (Twitter)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
By X Pro you can add tags to twitter profiles, and remember information about them.

Version 1.1
Added autocomplete to tag creation.
Added cancel button to add and edit tags.
